title: Strawberries and cream Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['400g caster sugar', '225g butter', '4 medium eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '250ml whole milk', '310g self-raising flour', 'For the filling', '280ml double cream', '250g fresh strawberries, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon icing sugar, plus additional for dusting', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract (optional)']
